transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan sir. 
Executive: Deva ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji sir bataiye.
Executive: Main Sumit Chaudhari baat kar raha hun sir senior manager India Mart head office se Adarsh communicator.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Ye abhi mujhe bataye abhi baat ho rahi thi meri Adarsh se abhi matlab aapki bhi baat hui hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To uske baad aapke paas mein feedback aapki baat hui thi na Adarsh se?
Customer: Sir abhi is list to meri baat hui nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi 19 tarikh ko 19 tarikh 12:30 pe subah sorry dopahar mein.
Customer: Achcha achcha ha hui hui hai. Hai na?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To ab us pe whatsapp pe feedback pahuncha hoga aapke paas India Mart ka Adarsh ke liye bhai by by mistake pehle maine no mein click kiya tha fir maine yes kar diya satisfied hun call ke sath karke.
Customer: Wo no aa gaya mere paas mein. Mujhe laga pata nahi kya issue hai mujhe laga pata nahi.
Customer: Click bhi kiya fir.
Executive: Koi baat nahi mujhe laga pata nahi kya issue hai ek baar main confirm kar leta hun. Actually maine lock khola phone ka to jaise hi maine slide kiya phone ko to pehle no mein click hua fir maine on the spot yes kar diya fir isko.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha. Baki sari cheeze clear hai kuch doubt nahi nahi koi baat nahi koi doubt to nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi sir ji sir badhiya hai sir.
Executive: Achcha abhi kaisa chal raha hai sara matlab business vagaira nikal main marketing mein nikala hua hun. Waha ghum raha hun main abhi ye mahina pura ho gaya mujhe bahar daudte hue.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha achcha. Haan to handle phone karna aap hi kar rahe ho?
Customer: Nahi nahi ek ladka maine baithaya hai specially IT section ka hai.
Executive: Haan haan wahi handle kar raha hai sara.
Customer: Achcha wahi kar raha hai haan calling main handle karta hun.
Executive: Okay. Matlab business to achcha khasa nikal raha hai na vaise?
Customer: Haan abhi sahi hai business.
Executive: To aap kab tak wapas aa jayenge matlab?
Customer: Kal savere sir main waha pahunch jaunga.
Executive: Achcha kal kis time ke aas pass main aapse baat kar lu kyunki mujhe baat karni hai aapse.
Customer: 12:30 12:00 se karib Banaras pahunchunga 1:00 1:30 ke karib hamari baat chit ho jayegi sir.
Executive: Main 1:00 1:30 baje ke aas pass mein kar dunga kyunki kuch cheeze thi jo mujhe lag raha hai ki aapse discuss kar leni chahiye. To ek baar main baat kar leta hun aap.
Customer: Kal schedule kar lete hain bhai 1:00 se 1:30 baje ka baat chit kar lenge main bhi rahunga wo ladka bhi rahega.
Executive: Haan haan 1:00 1:30 baje ke aas pass mein kar lete hain. Dusra iska email to aapke paas hi hoga na jo India Mart pe registered hai?
Customer: Ji sir ji sir.
Executive: Uska feedback aayega aapke paas mein abhi sir.
Customer: Main turant de dunga sir.
Executive: Achcha to maine socha pata nahi kya issue ho gaya. Dhyan dhyan rahe ji ji ji. Koi baat nahi koi baat nahi aap ek kaam kijiyega kal ek baar main call kar leta hun fir 1:30 baje ke aas pass.
Customer: Okay sir okay sir. Okay sir thank you sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer accidentally clicked 'No' on feedback form.

- Executive wanted to discuss some things with customer.



Resolution:

- Customer clarified the accidental negative feedback.

- Scheduled a call for the next day at 1:00-1:30 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, schedule, business, call
